abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during Bermuda Bowl world team championships in Veldhoven, the Netherlands.
snippet: At the world team championships in the Netherlands on Saturday, much to the delight of hundreds of spectators, the Bermuda Bowl was won by the host nation.
lead_paragraph: At the world team championships in the Netherlands on Saturday, much to the delight of hundreds of spectators, the Bermuda Bowl was won by the host nation.

headline.main: Dutch Hosts Are Winners of Bermuda Bowl
headline.print_headline: Dutch Hosts Are Winners of Bermuda Bowl
headline.seo: The Dutch Are Hosts and Winners of Bermuda Bowl - Bridge
